meanings.definition: Having the most intense or surreal experience
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride was the trippiest experience of my life.
meanings.sent2: The colors in the painting were the trippiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The trippiest part of the movie was when the characters traveled through time.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like the trippiest kaleidoscope of images.
meanings.sent5: The trippiest moment was when the magician made the elephant disappear.

meanings.sent1: The movie was a real trip, the trippiest I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house was the trippiest attraction at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The trippiest thing I've encountered is a talking cat.
meanings.sent4: His story about meeting aliens was the trippiest tale I've heard.
meanings.sent5: The trippiest part of the book was when the protagonist entered a parallel universe.

meanings.definition: The most visually stimulating or psychedelic
meanings.sent1: The art exhibit was a feast for the eyes, the trippiest display I've seen.
meanings.sent2: The concert had the trippiest light show I've ever witnessed.
meanings.sent3: The trippiest poster in his room seemed to move when you stared at it.
meanings.sent4: The trippiest album cover featured swirling colors and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The trippiest part of the video was the animated sequence with flying unicorns.
